---
title: "jwt_key_file_not_found.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines authentication settings for a system, specifically focusing on JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication. It specifies that authentication is required and includes settings for session management and JWT configuration with a reference to a public key file.

## Symbols

### `authentication`
#### Description
The root configuration object for authentication settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets authentication as required for the system
- Defines session and authentication method configurations

### `authentication.required`
#### Description
A boolean flag indicating whether authentication is mandatory for the system.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| required | boolean | Set to `true`, indicating that authentication is required |

### `authentication.session`
#### Description
Configures session-related settings for authentication.

#### Internal Logic
- Specifies the domain for the session
- Sets the secure flag for session cookies

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| domain | string | The domain for the session, set to "http://localhost:8080" |
| secure | boolean | Whether to use secure cookies, set to `false` |

### `authentication.methods`
#### Description
Defines the authentication methods available in the system.

### `authentication.methods.jwt`
#### Description
Configures the JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication method.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables JWT authentication
- Specifies the location of the public key file for JWT verification

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Set to `true`, enabling JWT authentication |
| public_key_file | string | Path to the JWT public key file, set to "testdata/authentication/jwt_key_file.pem" |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| authentication.required | boolean | true | Indicates if authentication is mandatory |
| authentication.session.domain | string | "http://localhost:8080" | The domain for the session |
| authentication.session.secure | boolean | false | Whether to use secure cookies for the session |
| authentication.methods.jwt.enabled | boolean | true | Enables JWT authentication method |
| authentication.methods.jwt.public_key_file | string | "testdata/authentication/jwt_key_file.pem" | Path to the JWT public key file |

## TODOs
The filename "jwt_key_file_not_found.yml" suggests that this configuration might be used in a test scenario where the specified JWT public key file is intentionally not present. This could be part of error handling or configuration validation tests in the larger application.
